item.description:
Sonya says:
My group Commissione giovani is hosting the event and I hope everyone can make it.

We're mixing it up a little bit this time, going to head to Winchester for our next aperitivo and check out Lucia's, the sister restaurant of the one down the North End. $20 cover will include all you can eat sliders and pizza, and one drink ticket. It's a good deal! If anyone has trouble getting to the location, feel free to contact us by phone, email or facebook, and we will make sure you get a ride to and from the closest T-stop. A presto!

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Aperitivo at Lucia's in Winchester
